messages.subject: Happy Birthday Teruhime!
messages.msgSnippet: Today is the birthday of Katamori s sister, Teruhime!  (13 Dec. 1832) In honor of her birthday, I have started a new livejournal:
messages.messageBody:
Today is the birthday of Katamori's sister, Teruhime! (13 Dec. 1832)

In honor of her birthday, I have started a new livejournal:

www.livejournal.com/~teruhime, where "Teruhime" will periodically post
interesting tidbits about herself, the women of the Aizu Joushitai, about
her brother, and any other (potentially embarrassing or not) tidbit she can
find. ^_^

--M.
